vsParam:
[px]!
I just find a way to make money!

Oh, very impassioned, Lydie!
What idea do you have this time?
Wow, you just come back to reality...

Yes. I figured that there's no shortcut in making money,
all that matters is to complete the commissions!

So... I am going to take a commission!
This is the one...

Let me see... "Commission to kill a monster"... Hey!
Everyone knows that this monster is very hard to kill!

Y, you are right... It says here that inexperienced adventurers
should not go challenge this monster...

Uh——!? W, what to do...
I am blinded by the remuneration...

Ha ha... You win.
In this case, we'll help you.
What... Are you really going to help me...
We must help you to the end.

T, thank you!
I really appreciate that.

Found it. This is the monster in the Commission!
Calm down first...

Phew, phew... We finally struck it down...
Thank you, guys.

You are welcome. We should help each other in tough times,
right, [px]?

!
Ho ho, guys, you are really a big help!

Uh, sorry...
You guys are really a big help!

But, isn't this nice?
Lydie can get the remuneration now.

That's good.
I hope Lydie's financial condition can get better...
No, the remuneration must be divided equally among us!

Uh, divided equally? N, no need.
You just take all of it...

No, that's not okay! You fought alongside me,
and you must share the remuneration with me!

No,
we did it for you...

I know! But my mother used to tell me that
you must be clear with money!

Alright, guys!
Let's go collect the remuneration!

Mmm... How to put it...
Lydie is really serious...

Yes... She may suffer losses because she's too serious...
In a way, Cresson and Lydie are alike.

Eh-hem, anyway... I am sure her personality is one of the
reasons that she can't make money...
